p:
A standard Rietveld analysis was carried out using the GSAS package and the EXPGUI interface
25 to refine the η-Al 41Sm 5 structure from GA search and DFT calculation. Lattice parameter, atomic coordinates, site occupancies, thermal parameters, and peak shape profiles are refined to get the XRD pattern in Fig. 4. Lattice parameters and atomic coordinates given by DFT calculations and the Rietveld analysis are provided in Table 1.
